remarks: The predicate "is a bounded linear operator."  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
bloval.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
bloval.4 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.

isblo2 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> ( T e. B <-> ( T e. L /\ ( N ` T ) e. RR ) ) ) $.
